data.title: B Flank Traps to Set Up Mid Lurk
data.description: Use these Trapwires and Cyber Cages when your team is leaning more toward B, and you are lurking Mid.

data.title: Default B Site Push Flank Traps
data.description: Here are two simple, and effective traps to use to make it difficult for enemy players to flank your team as they push B Site without alerting you and your team to their position.

data.title: Default A Site Push Flank Traps
data.description: Here are two simple, and effective to use to make it difficult for enemy players to flank your team as they push A Site without alerting you and your team to their position.
